attributes.action: ALL treatment for Gender Dysphoria should be free and received instantly
attributes.additional_details: I have been on the waiting lists for 2 years, maybe more ive lost count now and ive had no communication from the gender clinic. Gender Dysphoria is no joke, its a serious thing and has led to many self inflicted injuries or deaths because people are uneducated on the subject or simply don't agree with it. Its time for to get things  updated and let people in my situation live our lives without being in constant fear and denial.
attributes.background: The waiting lists are simply not a good solution, people like myself have put my life on hold, scared to leave the house, all because my body doesn't match my brain. I should be able to get treatment within a year, at the latest.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616754
